ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans low-fat, low-sodium condensed cream of mushroom soup
n: Healthier (but still awesome) Awesome Slow Cooker Pot Roast
des: "This is a very easy recipe for a delicious pot roast, I make it healthier by omitting the onion soup mix, using low-fat and low sodium cream of mushroom soup, and adding vegetables!"
ins:
Mix cream of mushroom soup, chopped onion, and chuck roast in a slow cooker.
Cook on High for 3 to 4 hours, or on Low for 8 to 9 hours. Add carrots, potatoes, string beans, and parsley 1 1/2 hours before the pot roast done.
